content.rendered:
Defi Opportunities and Swaps

Find the best opportunities
in crypto space and earn significantly

Play Video about crowdswap introduction video

our solution

A NON-STOP flight for your assets into the best OPPORTUNITIES… with a SIMPLE booking PROCESS!

Connect your wallet

  • Connect any liquidity source
  • More assets, better routes on the best price routing (BPR)

Select your desired opportunity

  • CrowdSwap has the best opportunities in DeFi
  • Extendable opportunity market place
  • Filter all opportunities to match your needs

Execute the best route

  • All routes from your assets to the chosen opportunity
  • Automated best-price-routing, transparency and security
  • Best-price route is always preselected
  • No struggling with odd bridges and 3rd party apps anymore

Start Earning!

  • CrowdSwap will guide you through all necessary steps
  • Minimal interactions needed - maximum transparency guaranteed
  • Start earning right after the route is successfully executed
  • Taking opportunities! - instead of laying out how to get there easily, securely, cheaply and in time.

Learn More

Features

Earn Significantly

Defi Opportunities

Crowdswap helps you invest in different opportunities like :

  • Yield farming
  • Liquidity mining
  • Staking
  • ...

Easily With the lowest risk possible

Save significantly on your swaps

Best Price Routing

Best-Price-Routing analyzes the whole DeFi space for the best prices and routes to your desired opportunity.

  • Using any kind of liquidity sources
  • Borderless price comparison
  • Transparent cost overview

CrowdSwap is cross-chain​

CCLP

​Cross-chain liquidity protocol helps transferring assets across all networks. With its own optimized pooling, you can easily swap native and stablecoin tokens between blockchains.

  • Fast execution
  • Secure transactions
  • Cost effective
  • Swap any asset

Meet our core team and advisors

CrowdSwap was founded by an experienced team from various industries

Roadmap 2022

CrowdSwap Roadmap is divided into milestone periods

Done

  • Whitepaper
  • Webpage
  • App
  • Best price routing
  • Mulit-chain support
  • User experience
  • Social media

Q4​

  • Community Engagement
  • SDK / API Development
  • Integration of new Chains/DEXs

Q1 2022

  • Token Launch
  • CCLP (liquidity pools)
  • Security Audits
  • Trading Opportunities
  • Staking UI
  • Campaign Everybody swap now!
  • Burning CROWD monthly

Q2​

  • CCLP (Liquidity protocol)
  • Announcement Long-term holders
  • Listings
  • Academy Opening
  • Affiliate
  • Campaign - No borders!

Q3

  • Staking Opportunities

  • Yield Opportunities

Q4

  • Opportunities
  • Surprise!

Q1 2023

  • Governance

Our community​

Become part of the community that enjoys benefits of the most sophisticated swapping app in the crypto industry.

Stay tuned with CrowdSwap Newsletter

No worries, we will never SPAM you. Join now and stay up to date on defi

Find the best Defi opportunities

CrowdSwap concentrates on providing the best opportunities in the crypto space built on top of our best-price-routing and aggregation algorithm, in addition to fast and secure cross-chain feature.

Launch the app
